name: Space Dungeon-3D
description:
Space Dungeon 3D platformer game.

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Space to jump

Double Space  for double jump

Escape for menu

updated on this project:

  • added new level 3
  • added new level 4
  • new music on level 1,3,4
  • new  user interface

created by 

Faisal Alshathri 

with assets from Michigan State University - Coursera Specialization

Game Design and Development 4: 3D Platformer
